20234.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Oh this is Relaxation Oil? Thanks
<pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20234.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「おおっ　これが　ナゴミオイルか。
　ありがとう　<pc>君！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20234.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 오오, 이게 아늑 오일이군.
　고맙다, <pc>!<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20234.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>哦哦！这就是平心油啊。
谢谢你，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20234.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>喔喔！這就是平心油啊。
謝謝你，<pc>！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20235.en:
Good. Now all I have to do is mix the ingredients with the ones my father prepared, and I should be able to make
a potion.
20235.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「よし。あとは　父上が用意してくれた材料と
　混ぜ合わせれば　薬が　できるはずだ。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20235.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 이제 아바마마가 준비해 주신 재료와
　섞으면 약이 완성될 거다.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20235.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>好，接下来只要把这个和父亲准备的材料
混合在一起，就能做成药了。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20235.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>好，接下來只要把這個和父親準備的材料
混合在一起，就能做成藥了。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20236.en: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Father! Ochitsuki grass, please.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20236.ja: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「父上！　オチツキ草をお願いします。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20236.ko: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 아바마마! 안정초를 부탁드립니다.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20236.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>父亲！拜托您准备静心草。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20236.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>父親！拜託您準備靜心草。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20237.en:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>Mm-hmm. I've got it all ready for you.
Well, it was hard work. I had to
mobilize 20 guards from the castle.<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20237.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>「うむ。ちゃんと用意してあるぞ。
　いやあ　苦労したのだよ。
　城の衛士を　２０名も動員してな……。<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20237.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>: 그래, 물론 완벽히 준비해 두었단다.
　이야, 어찌나 힘들었던지.
　성의 위사를 20명이나 동원해서…….<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20237.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>嗯，我已经准备好了。
哎呀，我可是费了很大的劲呢，
动用了２０名城里的士兵……<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20237.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>嗯，我已經準備好了。
哎呀，我可是費了很大的勁呢，
動用了２０名城裡的士兵……<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20238.en: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>Hmm? Ochitsuki grass?<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20238.ja: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>「ん？　オチ……ツキ草？<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20238.ko: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>: 응? 안정……초?<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20238.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>嗯？静心……草？<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20238.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>嗯？靜心……草？<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20239.en: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>What's the matter, Father!<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20239.ja: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「どうしたんですか　父上！？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20239.ko: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 왜 그러십니까, 아바마마!?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20239.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>怎么了，父亲？！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20239.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>怎麼了，父親！？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20240.en:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>Um, you know~ What is it? Was it the
ochitsuki weed that you needed?<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20240.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>「あの……その～　なんだ……。
　必要なのは　オチツキ草……だったか？<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20240.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>: 아니…… 그, 뭐냐…….
　필요한 재료가 안정초……였느냐?<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20240.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>啊……这个～那个……
你需要的是……静心草？<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20240.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>啊……這個～那個……
你需要的是……靜心草？<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20241.en: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Yes, but. So what?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20241.ja: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「そうですが……。それが　何か？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20241.ko: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 그렇습니다만……. 무슨 문제라도?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20241.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>是的……怎么了？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20241.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>是的……怎麼了？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20242.en:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>Wawasi painstakingly prepared the
Mobbit grass.<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20242.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>「ワ…ワシが　苦労して用意したのは……
　モ…モチツキ草……だった……。<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20242.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>: 내… 내가 그 고생을 하며 준비한 건……
　아… 안전초……였다…….<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20242.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>我、我费尽功夫准备的是……
饼、饼心草……<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20242.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>我、我費盡功夫準備的是……
鏡、鏡心草……<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20244.en:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>Wahahahaha. Don't worry. I'm sure
there's some Otitsuki grass in storage
at the castle!<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20244.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>「わはっ……わははは。安心しろ。
　オチツキ草なら　たしか　この城にも
　いくつか　保管されていたはずだ！<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20244.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>: 으하…… 으하하하, 걱정 말거라.
　안정초라면 아마 성에도
　어느 정도 비축분이 있을 거다!<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20244.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>哇哈……哇哈哈哈。放心吧，
我记得这座城里
保管着一些静心草！<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20244.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>哇哈……哇哈哈哈。放心吧，
我記得這座城裡
有保管一些靜心草的！<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20247.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Because your father is so careless, it
becomes commonplace to talk about how
a man should not ascend to the throne.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20247.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「……父上が　そのように　いいかげんだから
　男が　王位に就くべきではないなどという話が
　当たり前のように　なってしまうんですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20247.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: ……아바마마께서 그렇게 덤벙거리시니
　남자가 왕위를 이어서는 안 된다는
　말이 당연시되는 것 아닙니까.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20247.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>……都是因为父亲做事这么马虎，
才会让男人不该继承王位
变得理所当然。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20247.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>……都是因為父親做事這麼馬虎，
才會讓男人不該繼承王位
變成理所當然的事。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20248.en: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>It's a real shame.<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20248.ja: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>「まったくもって　面目ない……。<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20248.ko: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>: 정말 면목이 없다…….<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20248.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>真是羞愧……<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20248.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00421 _normal m00001>真是羞愧……<stop_lip_animation n00421 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20249.en:
I'm off to get some ochitsuki grass and make a potion for synchronization. Mother, please prepare to sing a song
of blessing.
20249.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「……僕は　オチツキ草を取りにいって
　同調のための薬を　作ってきます。
　母上は　恵みの歌を唄う準備をお願いします。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20249.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: ……전 안정초를 가져와 동조를 위한
　약을 만들겠습니다. 어마마마께서는
　은혜의 노래를 부를 준비를 해 주십시오.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20249.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>……我去采静心草
来调和药物。
母亲，请您去做唱恩惠之歌的准备。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20249.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>……我去採靜心草
來調和藥物。
母親，請您去做準備，好唱恩惠之歌。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20250.en:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>Okay, let's go to the balcony. Let the
people of the castle judge the
outcome.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20250.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「わかった。バルコニーに行くとしよう。
　城下の民にも　結果を見定めてもらうのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20250.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>: 알았다. 난 발코니에 가 있으마.
　백성들에게도 결과를 보여야 하니까.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20250.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>好的，那就到露台去吧，
让城里的居民也一起见证结果。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20250.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>好的，那就到露台去吧，
讓城鎮的居民也一起見證結果。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20251.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>I'm looking forward to working with
you, Mother. I'll be on my way as soon
as I make the pills myself.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20251.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「よろしくお願いします　母上。
　僕も薬を作ったら　すぐに向かいます。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20251.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 그럼 부탁드립니다, 어마마마.
　저도 약이 완성되면 바로 가겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20251.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>拜托您了，母亲。
我调好药后也会立刻过去的。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20251.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>拜託您了，母親。
我調好藥後也會立刻過去的。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20252.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>I'd like you to be there. I want you
to come to the castle balcony.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20252.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「君にも　ぜひ　立ち会ってもらいたいんだ。
　城のバルコニーまで　来てほしい。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20252.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 너도 꼭 지켜봐 줬으면 한다.
　성 발코니로 와 다오.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20252.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>我希望你也能一起来见证，
到露台来吧。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20252.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>我希望你也能一起來見證，
到城堡的露台來吧。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20253.en:
Thanks for the wait. Thanks to the Relaxation Oil you prepared for me, I have completed the
potion to attune my mind with your mother's.
20253.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「<pc>君　待たせたな。
　君が用意してくれた　ナゴミオイルのおかげで
　母上と心を同調させるための薬は　完成したぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20253.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: <pc>, 기다리게 해서 미안하다.
　네가 준비해 준 아늑 오일 덕분에 어마마마와
　마음을 동조하기 위한 약이 완성됐어.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20253.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001><pc>，让你久等了。
多亏了你准备的平心油，
我终于调好和母亲心连心的药了。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20253.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001><pc>，讓你久等了。
多虧了你準備的平心油，
我終於調好和母親心連心的藥了。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20254.en:
I feel very calm after taking the pills. This will create the effect of a song of grace. Now, go ahead and
take your reward first.
20254.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「薬を飲んで　とても　落ち着いた気分だ。
　これで　恵みの歌の効果を生みだせるだろう。
　さあ　報酬を先に　受け取ってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20254.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 약을 먹으니 마음이 무척 차분해지는군.
　이제 은혜의 노래의 효과를 일으킬 수 있겠지.
　자, 우선 보수부터 받아 다오.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20254.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>喝下药以后心情很平静，
这样恩惠之歌也能产生效果吧。
来，你先收下报酬。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20254.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>喝下藥以後心情很平靜，
這樣恩惠之歌也能產生效果吧。
來，你先收下報酬。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！
　<update_quedate><open_irai>

20255.en: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>All right. Let's sing a song of grace!<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20255.ja: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「よし。では　恵みの歌を唄おう！！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20255.ko: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 그럼 은혜의 노래를 부르겠어!!<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20255.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>好，那么我来唱恩惠之歌！！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20255.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>好，那麼我來唱恩惠之歌！！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20256.en: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Mother. Give me the power of royalty.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20256.ja: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「母上。王家のチカラを　僕に……。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20256.ko: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 어마마마, 왕가의 힘을 제게…….<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20256.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>母亲，请将王族的力量赐予我……<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20256.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>母親，請將王家的力量賜予我……<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20257.en: <start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>Odis, I believe you can do it.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20257.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「オーディス。わらわは
　お前なら　できると信じているぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20257.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>: 오디스, 난
　네가 해낼 수 있으리라 믿는다.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20257.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>奥迪斯，我相信
你一定可以的。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20257.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>奧迪斯，我相信
你一定可以的。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20258.en:
Born in the sea, live in the sea. That
is our Weddie people.
20258.ja:
<center>……海に生まれ　海に生きる。
それが我ら　ウェディの民。
20258.ko:
<center>……바다에서 태어나 바다에서 살아간다.
그것이 우리 웨디.
20258.zh-Hans:
<center>……海中生，海中栖。
此乃吾等，维迪之民。
20258.zh-Hant:
<center>……海中生，海中棲。
此乃吾等，維迪之民。

20259.en:
Praying to the Mother Sea, we ask for
God's grace.
20259.ja:
<center>母なる海に祈りを捧げ
我らは求める　神の恵みを。
20259.ko:
<center>어머니 바다에 기도를 올리며
우리는 신의 은총을 구하니.
20259.zh-Hans:
<center>我们向大海母亲祈祷，
请将恩泽赐予众生。
20259.zh-Hant:
<center>我們向大海母親祈禱，
請將恩澤賜予眾生。

20260.en:
Great God of the sea, protect our
lives and our thoughts. Protect our
lives, our thoughts, and purify us.
20260.ja:
<center>大いなる海の神よ。
我らの命　我らの思い
守りたまえ　清めたまえ……。
20260.ko:
<center>위대한 바다의 신이시여.
우리의 생명, 우리의 마음을
지키고 정화해 주시옵소서…….
20260.zh-Hans:
<center>伟大的海神啊，
请守护我们的生命，
净化我们的思想……
20260.zh-Hant:
<center>偉大的海神啊，
請守護我們的生命，
淨化我們的思想……

20261.en: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Why? Why isn't anything happening?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20261.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「……なぜだ。
　どうして　何も起こらないんだ！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20261.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: ……왜지?
　왜 아무 일도 일어나지 않는 거야!<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20261.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>……为什么？
为何什么事都没发生？！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20261.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>……為什麼？
為何什麼事都沒發生！？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20262.en:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>It can't be. Odis has the credentials
of a king, the straw feels.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20262.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「……そんなはずはない。
　オーディスには　王の資格があると
　わらわは　感じている。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20262.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>: ……이상하구나.
　오디스 네게는 왕의 자격이 있어.
　난 알 수 있다.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20262.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>……不可能，
我确实能感受到奥迪斯
拥有成为国王的资格。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20262.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>……不可能，
我確實能感受到奧迪斯
有著成為國王的資格。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20263.en:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>It is impossible for the power of song
to be completely unleashed.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20263.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「歌のチカラが　まったく発揮されないなど
　ありえないことだ……。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20263.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>: 노래의 힘이 전혀 발휘되지 않다니
　이건 있을 수 없는 일이야…….<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20263.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>歌曲的力量完全没有发挥出来，
真是难以置信……<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20263.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>歌曲的力量完全沒有發揮出來，
真是難以置信……<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20264.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Is it that I haven't worked hard
enough?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20264.ja: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「僕の努力が　まだ足りないというのか……。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20264.ko: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 내 노력이 아직 부족하단 뜻인가…….<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20264.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>这表示我的努力还不够吗……？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20264.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>這表示我的努力還不夠嗎……？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20265.en:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>That song of grace is not effective
when sung by men.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20265.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「……その恵みの歌は
　男性が唄っても　効果が出ないのです。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20265.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: ……그 은혜의 노래는
　남자가 부르면 아무 효과를 발휘하지 않아요.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20265.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>……恩惠之歌
男性唱了也不会有效果的。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20265.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>……恩惠之歌
男子唱了也不會有效果的。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20266.en: <start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Celia. do you know anything about it?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20266.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「セーリア……。
　君は　何か知っているのか？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20266.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 셀리아…….
　혹시 뭔가 아는 건가?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20266.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>塞莉娅……
你是不是知道些什么？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20266.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>賽莉雅……
妳是不是知道些什麼？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20267.en:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>This is a story my father Ladis
forbade me to tell to future
generations.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20267.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「これは……私の父　ラーディスより
　後世に伝えることを　禁じられた話です。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20267.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: 제 아버지…… 라디스는 이 이야기를
　후세에 전하는 걸 금지하셨습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20267.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>这事……本来我父亲拉迪斯
下令禁止告诉后人。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20267.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>這事……本來我父親拉迪斯
下令禁止告訴後人。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20268.en:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>But the prince is the one who saved
me. If I don't do anything, I'll have
to repay him in kind.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20268.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「ですが　王子は　私を救ってくれた恩人。
　このまま　だまっていては
　その恩をアダで　返すことになってしまう……。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20268.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: 하지만 왕자님은 절 구해주신 은인.
　이대로 침묵을 지키는 건
　그 은혜를 저버리는 일이니까요…….<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20268.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>但是王子您是拯救了我的恩人，
这样默不作声下去，
我怕会恩将仇报……<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20268.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>但是王子您是拯救了我的恩人，
這樣默不作聲下去，
我怕會恩將仇報……<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20269.en:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>Oh, my. Your father was King Ladis,
the last male king.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20269.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「なんと……。そなたの父は
　最後の男王　ラーディス王であったか。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20269.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>: 이럴 수가……. 그대의 아버지가
　마지막 남왕인 라디스 왕이었단 말인가.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20269.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>你说什么……你的父亲
就是最后的男王，拉迪斯王吗？<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20269.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>妳說什麼……妳的父親
就是最後的男王，拉迪斯王嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20270.en:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>Yes, I did. I wasn't hiding it, but I
couldn't say it in front of the
prince.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20270.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「はい……。隠していたわけでは　ありませんが
　王子を前にして　言いだせなくて……。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20270.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: 네……. 숨기려던 것은 아니었습니다만
　왕자님 앞에서는 얘기를 꺼낼 수가 없어서…….<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20270.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>是的……我并没有打算要隐瞒，
只是面对王子不敢直言……<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20270.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>是的……我並沒有打算要隱瞞，
只是面對王子不敢直言……<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20271.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Don't worry about that. You said it
doesn't work when a man sings? I want
you to tell me what you mean.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20271.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「そんなことは　気にしなくてもいい。
　男が唄っても　効果がないと言ったね？
　どういうことなのか　教えてほしいんだ。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20271.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 그런 건 신경 쓸 필요 없어.
　남자가 부르면 효과를 발휘하지 않는다고 했지?
　왜인지 알려 주겠어?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20271.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>不用在意这些事情。
你说就算男人来唱也不会有效果，
究竟是什么缘故，请你告诉我。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20271.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>不用在意這些事情。
妳說就算男人來唱也不會有效果，
究竟是什麼緣故，請妳告訴我。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20272.en:
A long time ago. A long time ago, there was a song that gave sacred blessings to the seas surrounding the
archipelago, a song called the Song of Nurture.
20272.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「遠い昔……。
　諸島を囲む海に　聖なる加護を与える歌は
　育みの歌と呼ばれる　ひとつの歌でした。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20272.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: 먼 옛날…….
　제도의 바다에 성스러운 가호를 내리는 노래는
　키움의 노래라 부르는 하나의 노래였습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20272.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>在很久很久以前……
为环绕群岛的大海带来神圣庇佑的，
原本只有一首名为养育之歌的歌曲。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20272.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>在很久很久以前……
為環繞群島的大海賦予神聖庇護的，
原本只有一首名為化育之歌的歌曲。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20273.en:
However, over the course of its long history, the nurture songs have been divided into two types of songs in
order to enhance the effectiveness of the songs.
20273.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「ですが　長い歴史の中で
　育みの歌は　歌の効果を高めるため
　ふたつの歌に　分けられました。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20273.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: 하지만 긴 세월이 흐르면서
　키움의 노래는 효과를 증폭시키기 위해
　2개의 노래로 나뉘었습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20273.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>然而，在漫长的历史中，
为了提升歌曲的效果，养育之歌
被分成了两首歌。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20273.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>然而，在漫長的歷史中，
為了提升歌曲的效果，化育之歌
被分成了兩首歌。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20274.en:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>The Song of Grace is one of them. It
was written for the queen to sing.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20274.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「恵みの歌は　そのひとつ。
　女王が唄うために作られた　歌なのです。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20274.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: 은혜의 노래는 그중 하나.
　여왕이 부르기 위해 만들어진 노래입니다.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20274.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>恩惠之歌就是其中之一，
那是为了让女王歌唱而创作的曲子。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20274.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>恩惠之歌就是其中之一，
那是為了讓女王歌唱而創作的曲子。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20275.en:
For queens to sing? Does that mean that songs for male kings also exist? But no such songs have been handed
down to the royal family.
20275.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「女王が唄うため……？　ということは
　男王のための歌も　存在するというのか？
　だが　そんな歌は　王家に伝わっていない……。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20275.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 여왕이 부르기 위해……? 그렇다면
　남왕을 위한 노래도 존재한단 뜻인가?
　하지만 왕가에 그런 노래는 안 남아 있어…….<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20275.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>为让女王歌唱所作……？意思是，
也有为男王创作的歌曲吗？
但是，王族并没有传下来这样的歌啊……<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20275.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>為讓女王歌唱所作……？意思是，
也有為男王創作的歌曲嗎？
但是，王家並沒有傳下這樣的歌啊……<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20276.en:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>The Song of the Man King was sealed in
the hands of King Ladis when he
abdicated his throne.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20276.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「男王の歌は　ラーディス王が
　王位を退く際に　その手で封印しました。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20276.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: 남왕의 노래는 라디스 왕이
　퇴위와 동시에 자신의 손으로 봉인했습니다.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20276.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>男王之歌在拉迪斯王退位时
被他亲手封印了。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20276.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>男王之歌在拉迪斯王退位時
被他親手封印了。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20277.en:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>I see, that is why the queen ruled the
country after King Ladis.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20277.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「……なるほど。ラーディス王以降に
　女王が国を治める時代となったのも
　それゆえ……というわけか。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20277.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>: ……그렇군, 라디스 왕 이후로
　여왕이 나라를 다스리게 된 건
　그런 이유 때문이었나…….<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20277.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>……原来如此。在拉迪斯王以后
就进入女王统治国家的时代
也是这个原因……是吧。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20277.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>……原來如此。在拉迪斯王以後
就進入女王統治國家的時代
也是這個原因……是吧。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20278.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Do you know where the Song of the Man
King was sealed?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20278.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「男王の歌が　どこに封印されたのか
　君は　知っているのか？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20278.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 그대는 남왕의 노래가
　어디에 봉인되었는지 아나?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20278.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>你知道男王之歌
被封印在哪里吗？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20278.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>妳知道男王之歌
被封印在哪裡嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20279.en: <start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>I'm sorry. I don't know about that.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20279.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「ごめんなさい……。
　それは　私にも　わからないのです。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20279.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: 죄송합니다…….
　그건 저도 몰라요.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20279.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>对不起……
这个我也不知道。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20279.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>對不起……
這個我也不知道。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20280.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Nope. Don't be sorry. It's not your
fault.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20280.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「いや。あやまらないでくれ。
　君が悪いわけじゃない。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20280.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 아니, 사과할 필요 없어.
　그대의 잘못이 아니니까.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20280.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>没关系，你别道歉，
这并不是你的错。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20280.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>沒關係，妳別道歉，
這並不是妳的錯。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20281.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Thank you Celia, you broke your
promise to your father to tell me this
for my sake.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20281.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「……ありがとう　セーリア。
　君は　僕のために　父上との約束を破って
　このことを　話してくれたんだね。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20281.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: ……고마워, 셀리아.
　그대는 날 위해 아바마마와의
　약속을 깨고 이 이야기를 해 준 거로군.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20281.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>……谢谢你，塞莉娅。
为了我，你违背与父亲的约定，
讲述了这些事情。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20281.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>……謝謝妳，賽莉雅。
為了我，妳違背與父親的約定，
講述了這些事情。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20282.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Thanks to you, I know what I must do
to become king. I'll find the song
that's been sealed away!<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20282.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「君のおかげで　王になるために
　僕が　やるべきことが　わかった。
　封印された歌を　見つけだしてみせよう！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20282.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 그대 덕분에 왕이 되기 위해
　내가 해야 할 일이 뭔지 알았어.
　봉인된 노래를 반드시 찾아내고 말겠어!<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20282.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>多亏了你，我总算知道
自己该做什么才能成为国王。
我要把被封印的歌曲找出来！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20282.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>多虧了妳，我總算知道
自己該做什麼才能成為國王。
我要把被封印的歌曲找出來！<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20283.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Perhaps I may need your help. If so, I
would appreciate your help
<pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20283.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「もしかしたら　君のチカラを
　借りることに　なるかもしれない。
　そのときは　よろしく頼むぞ　<pc>君。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20283.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 어쩌면 네 힘을
　빌리게 될지도 모르겠군.
　그때는 잘 부탁한다, <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20283.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>或许我还要借助
你的力量呢。
到时就拜托你啰，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20283.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>或許我還要借助
你的力量呢。
到時就拜託你囉，<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20284.en:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>Celia! I'd like to hear more about
you. I'd like to hear more about what
you have to say.<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20284.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>「セーリア！　くわしい話を聞かせてほしい。
　一緒に来てくれるかい？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20284.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>: 셀리아! 자세한 이야기를 듣고 싶어.
　함께 가 주겠어?<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20284.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>塞莉娅！我想了解详情，
你能一起过来吗？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20284.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00417 _normal m00001>賽莉雅！我想瞭解詳情，
妳能一起過來嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00417 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20285.en: <start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>Yes. I'm going.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20285.ja: <start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>「は……はい。行きます。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20285.ko: <start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>: 아…… 알겠습니다. 갈게요.<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20285.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>好……好的，我愿意去。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20285.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00419 _normal m00001>好……好的，我願意去。<stop_lip_animation n00419 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20286.en:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>Apparently, there is still a hurdle to
cross before Odis can become king.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20286.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「どうやら　オーディスが　王となるためには
　まだ　越えねばならぬカベが　あるようだ。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20286.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>: 아무래도 오디스가 왕이 되기 위해서는
　넘어야 할 벽이 더 있는 것 같구나.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20286.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>看来奥迪斯要成为国王
还得跨越一道巨大的阻碍才行啊。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20286.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>看來奧迪斯要成為國王
還得跨越一道巨大的阻礙才行啊。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>

20287.en:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>In the future, if Odis ever needs your
help, please lend her a hand. I ask
this not as a queen, but as a mother.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20287.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>「今後も　オーディスが　そなたを
　必要としたときは　手を貸してやってくれ。
　女王として……いや　母としての頼みだ。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20287.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>: 앞으로도 오디스가 그대를 필요로 할 때
　기꺼이 도와주기 바란다.
　여왕으로서…… 아니, 어미로서 부탁하마.<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20287.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>今后如果奥迪斯需要你的帮忙，
请务必助他一臂之力。
这是身为女王……不对，身为母亲的请求。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
20287.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00418 _normal m00001>今後如果奧迪斯需要你的幫忙，
請務必助他一臂之力。
這是女王……不對，是一個母親的請求。<stop_lip_animation n00418 CLOSE_MOUTH>
